title: The threat of nuclear war is real, top Russian official says; U.S. wants to see Moscow 'weakened'.
content:
1. The threat of nuclear war is real, top Russian official says; U.S. wants to see Moscow 'weakened'.  CNBC
  2. Russia-Ukraine live news: Lavrov warns of risk of World War III  Al Jazeera English
  3. In escalation of rhetoric, Moscow cites 'real' risk of nuclear war  Reuters.com
  4. Russia-Ukraine war: what we know on day 62 of the invasion  The Guardian
  5. Russia Warns of 'Real' Nuclear War Risk as Ukraine Talks Go On  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 核戦争の脅威は現実的とロシア高官が発言、米国はモスクワの「弱体化」を望んでいる。
俄罗斯高级官员称核战争的威胁是真实的；美国希望看到莫斯科被 "削弱"。
俄羅斯高級官員稱核戰爭的威脅是真實的；美國希望看到莫斯科被 "削弱"。
